thread.section_title: Hotel de Lille - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: hotel from a movie
thread.title_full: hotel from a movie - Review of Hotel de Lille, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Garreth M
title: hotel from a movie
text:
what can you say, it's just a great little hotel and is as Paris as you can get in your minds eye as to what a hotel should be like. location is perfect as it was fairly central to all the main tourist attractions in Paris. we where lucky enough to get a room on the top floor(5th floor) which gave us a view of the Eiffel tower in the distance. the room itself was very stylish and yet while small was well laid out for the family to be comfortable in the space provided. staff are friendly and very helpful.
this is a hotel that I would/will visit again when I visit Paris again.
